name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-richtext-editor
title: Rich Text Editor - Fluent UI
shortDescription: A robust rich text editor utilizing the latest Fluent React components to seamlessly align with SharePoint Online Modern UI standards. Full control over UI and backend code, making integration with external systems like SharePoint lists a breeze. Inspiration is drawn from the out-of-the-box Text web part.
longDescription: A robust rich text editor utilizing the latest Fluent React components to seamlessly align with SharePoint Online Modern UI standards. Full control over UI and backend code, making integration with external systems like SharePoint lists a breeze. Inspiration is drawn from the out-of-the-box Text web part.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
